product_name: Topeak Weatherproof Dyna Wedge Saddle Pack
long_description: Weighing merely 45g, the Topeak Weatherproof Dyna Wedge Saddle Pack offers enough room for a tube and small repair items and features tough fabric that offers protection in any conditions. Aerodynamic design fits neatly between seat rails. Fits seatpost diameters of 25.4mm - 31.8mm, and offers compatability with most types of saddle rails. Topeak Weatherproof Dyna Wedge Saddle Pack mounts to saddle rails and seatpost with rip-and-stick straps.
short_description: Weighing merely 45g, the Topeak Weatherproof Dyna Wedge Saddle Pack offers enough room for a tube and small repair items and features tough fabric that offers protection in any conditions.
